question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding the La Hotte glanded frog?
1) They are endemic to the Massif de la Hotte, Haiti.
2) Its most distinctive feature is its striking blue sapphire-colored eyes.
3) The IUCN status of the La Hotte glanded frog is Critically Endangered.
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation: La Hotte glanded frog is endemic to the Massif de la Hotte, Haiti. The most distinctive feature of the La Hotte glanded frog is its striking blue sapphire-colored eyes. The IUCN status of the La Hotte glanded frog is Critically Endangered.
